argumentText:
ARGUMENT
f x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ghmmhm | |- ( f e. ( S GrpHom T ) -> f e. ( S MndHom T ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` T ) = ( Base ` T ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` S ) = ( +g ` S ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` T ) = ( +g ` T ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpll | |- ( ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) /\ f e. ( S MndHom T ) ) -> S e. Grp ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simplr | |- ( ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) /\ f e. ( S MndHom T ) ) -> T e. Grp ) |
| 8 | 2, 3 | #P_mhmf | |- ( f e. ( S MndHom T ) -> f : ( Base ` S ) --> ( Base ` T ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) /\ f e. ( S MndHom T ) ) -> f : ( Base ` S ) --> ( Base ` T ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 4, 5 | #P_mhmlin | |- ( ( f e. ( S MndHom T ) /\ x e. ( Base ` S ) /\ y e. ( Base ` S ) ) -> ( f ` ( x ( +g ` S ) y ) ) = ( ( f ` x ) ( +g ` T ) ( f ` y ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3expb | |- ( ( f e. ( S MndHom T ) /\ ( x e. ( Base ` S ) /\ y e. ( Base ` S ) ) ) -> ( f ` ( x ( +g ` S ) y ) ) = ( ( f ` x ) ( +g ` T ) ( f ` y ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantll | |- ( ( ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) /\ f e. ( S MndHom T ) ) /\ ( x e. ( Base ` S ) /\ y e. ( Base ` S ) ) ) -> ( f ` ( x ( +g ` S ) y ) ) = ( ( f ` x ) ( +g ` T ) ( f ` y ) ) ) |
| 13 | 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, 12 | #P_isghmd | |- ( ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) /\ f e. ( S MndHom T ) ) -> f e. ( S GrpHom T ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_ex | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) -> ( f e. ( S MndHom T ) -> f e. ( S GrpHom T ) ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 14 | #P_impbid2 | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) -> ( f e. ( S GrpHom T ) <-> f e. ( S MndHom T ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_eqrdv | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) -> ( S GrpHom T ) = ( S MndHom T ) ) |
